titleStmt.title: Pharisaism display'd, or Hypocrisie detected In a sermon preached in St. Mary's Church in Stamford, August the 21st, 1690. Being the triennial visitation of the right Reverend father in God, Thomas Lord Bishop of Lincoln. By George Topham, prebendary of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Topham, George, d. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Fox, at the Angel in Westminster-Hall; and are to be sold by Mr. Caldecot, bookseller, in Stamford, Lincolnshire,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
